com.ge.dspmicro.tcpsocketserver.api

Interface IRawTCPSocketService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ITCPSocketHandler
    Deprecated. 
    Use java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel to manage socket connections.

    @Deprecated
public interface IRawTCPSocketService
extends ITCPSocketHandler
    Encapsulates the callback behavior for handling events from a TCPSocketServer running in 'Raw' mode.

    Bundles that wish to receive events from a TCPSocketServer instance must register with the TCPSocketServer using the ITCPSocketServer interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBytesRead(byte[] data, String connectionId)
      Deprecated. 
      Called by a TCPSocketServer instance when bytes are read from a client connection

      Deprecated. 
      Called by a TCPSocketServer instance when a client connection is closed
      void onError(Throwable error, String connectionId)
      Deprecated. 
      Called by a TCPSocketServer an connection related error occurs
      ByteBuffer onNewClientConnection(IRawTCPSocketConnection connection, String connectionId)
      Deprecated. 
      Called by a TCPSocketServer instance when a new client is connected.

    • Method Detail

      • onNewClientConnection

        ByteBuffer onNewClientConnection(IRawTCPSocketConnection connection,
                               String connectionId)
        Deprecated. 
        Called by a TCPSocketServer instance when a new client is connected.
        Parameters:
        connection - - connection object to the remote client
        connectionId - - unique identifier for this connection
        Returns:
        the ByteBuffer the socket server will write to when client data is received. If null, a buffer will be created with default size according to property com.ge.dspmicro.tcpsocketserver.max_msg_bytes

      • onConnectionClosed

        void onConnectionClosed(String connectionId)
        Deprecated. 
        Called by a TCPSocketServer instance when a client connection is closed
        Parameters:
        connectionId - - unique identifier for this connection

      • onError

        void onError(Throwable error,
           String connectionId)
        Deprecated. 
        Called by a TCPSocketServer an connection related error occurs
        Parameters:
        error - - the throwable error
        connectionId - - unique identifier for this connection

      • onBytesRead

               String connectionId)
        Deprecated. 
        Called by a TCPSocketServer instance when bytes are read from a client connection
        Parameters:
        data - - new bytes from client
        connectionId - - unique identifier for this connection
